ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-EbonHawk-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Ebon Hawk was a Dynamic-class freighter and a smuggler ship. It was well-known throughout the galaxy. The ship was heavily modified over the course of its life, to the point that it was difficult to determine its origins. With its extremely powerful hyperdrive, the ship was believed to be the fastest ship in the Outer Rim Territories.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.DropShell_Description: Fast Droping shell to around position

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-HammerheadCruiser-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Hammerhead-class cruiser was a type of warship used by the Republic Navy. One of the most successful warship designs in galactic history, the Hammerhead-class would still see use in sector defense forces millennia after its introduction and would inspire many later ship designs.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.DropShell_Description: Fast Droping shell to around position

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel
Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-AurekStrikefighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Aurek-class tactical strikefighter, also known as the original A-wing, was a Republic starfighter, several models of which were used in the Old Sith Wars, the Great Galactic War, the New Sith Wars, and even until the final generation of the Republic.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel
Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-DefenderCorvette-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Defender-class light corvette was produced specifically for use by Jedi as a mobile operations base and a capable starfighter in its own right. The corvette could be flown by a single pilot.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-BT7Thunderclap-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The BT-7 Thunderclap was an assault ship model in the Republic Military, commonly used by Republic troopers.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-FuryInterceptor-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Fury-class Imperial Interceptor was a starship used by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War and its resultant Cold War.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-SithInterceptor-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Sith Interceptor, was a starfighter that formed the bulk of Darth Revan and Darth Malak's space forces during the Jedi Civil War. A single-seater fighter that had not been designed with the comfort or safety of the pilot in mind.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-PhantomPrototype-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The X-70B Phantom-class prototype was a prototype starship of the reconstituted Sith Empire used by Imperial Intelligence. The sleek appearance of the X-70B Phantom was designed to pass for a civilian luxury shuttle, despite its array of hidden components. Its bridge was shielded by the forward armor plating, and was equipped with advanced, precision flight instruments.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-BasiliskWarDroid-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Basilisk War Droids were a fearsome, heavily armored, semi-sentient, four-legged droids used by the Mandalorian Crusaders.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-MantisPatrolCraft-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: Built for combat, the rare, compact-framed D5-Mantis was a best-in-class patrol craft, designed to compete with much larger starships, such as Interdictor-class cruisers.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-XSFreighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The XS stock light freighter was considered a major advancement in armament, speed and versatility over previous models of light freighter. It was considered one of the fastest and most agile starships in the galaxy.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-SupremacyMKVIStarfighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Mark VI Supremacy-class starfighter, also known as the ISF interceptor or simply the Mk. VI interceptor, was a model of fighter used by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War.
